name: Hell Trigger (itch)
description:
I want to go back home.

One day, you wake up to a deserted bunker. There is not a single soul nearby.
With a revolver as the only companion in the empty aftermath, they must traverse the war-torn environment in order to fulfil his wish.

There are main main mechanics in this game, provided by the revolver's bullets: 

Grapple hook and time-stop.

Hell Trigger is: 

  • A game with simple mechanics with the revolver but has a high skill ceiling. The difficulty increases drastically as you progress.
  • A side scroller platformer where the main objective is to adapt to environmental hazards 
  • A game created with a pixel-art style

[ Release date: April 20 2022 ]

Author: Boar Handlers Boar Handlers is a team of Software Engineering and Creative Technologies students led by Ethan Uy. Other members include Aliexis Alvarez, Liam Vallesfin, Sangwoo Lee, Alyx Bolivar and Logan Leilua.
